ygData.subject: Re: Research of New Staff *SPOLIER*

ygData.messageBody:
*SPOLIER**SPOLIER**SPOLIER**SPOLIER**SPOLIER**SPOLIER**SPOLIER*



Staff of Writhing


The staff of writhing is one of the various skull staff's in the game(which look similar to the staff
that the Priest of Discord is equipping). This particular staff is a 1 handed blunt weapon and can be equipped by
Necromancers, Enchanters, Wizards, Magicians and Bards. It has a damage of 9, a delay of 33 and has the effect of
chaotic feedback(which does 48 points of damage when successful).

Found on EQ-Lizer.

~~Farwen "Mightyraven" Ohatarin~~
--Ravenwalker--
Wizard of the 18th level (finally) on Xegony!

Willing to trade languages in game I know a few and need to learn some magic tongues! Ask for Farwen!


Elminstr95@... wrote:

> From: Elminstr95@...
>
> I saw a level 40 gnome necro with the staff. It is called a Staff of
> Writhing. He said he got it from killing the Priest of Discord.
>
